name: TicTac (Lst Br Games)
description:
Tic Tac the Game

In this game you will spend your time playing against your computer

Added 3 modes

Easy, Medium, and Difficult,

In easy mode, you won't have any difficulties,

in medium mode, the computer will already have some abilities and,

in hard mode, logic will try to win anyway

Have a good time

Lst br Games Thank you for visiting
